review: These are amazing. Turn your TV into a smartTV controlled by your smartphone for a bargain. Definitely recommend to all.
author: Mark K.

review: Worked 1/4th of the time. Gonna try the Amazon one.
author: LRL

review: Youtube, HBO Go, Netflix, Hulu, Plex, Vevo, just a few samples of the items you can stream on your television at HD. It takes 2 minutes to setup, it connects to your WiFi, and it can be controlled via smartphone or tablet. It's awesome, just buy one. Hell, buy 10; they make awesome holiday presents.
author: Mathew Charles Eng

review: Does exactly what it's supposed to. Got a new smart tv so now I use this one in the bedroom to watch netflix from my phone before bed.
author: Nicole Hauser

review: I love this product it works and I can stream straight from my smartphone works great
author: Noni Kimbrough

review: Love it. Easy installation - fixed problems since earlier releases.
author: Laura

review: So easy to use and set up.
author: Kevin P. Spellman "GoVols"
